name: Disturbing the Equilibrium
description:
This structure connects the universe and symbolizes balance, in all things, big or small. The separate parts start off as equal but then the human disturbs the equilibrium, causing nothing but destruction. 

How to Play: 

  • Mouse only.
  • Drag mouse to rotate the structures.
  • Click on the shapes to gain points. 
  • Find the correct shape fast for higher combo and higher score.
  • If you cannot find the right shape use the Mix them up button.

A relaxing puzzle game, suitable for all ages. Improving shape/pattern recognition, 3-dimensional spatial awareness, memory, puzzle solving, reaction time and accuracy. 

Game by Rumen Petrov 

2020 Playmaker Game Jam!
Made with Unity and 100% Playmaker.

Thanks for playing and please VOTE!

Free assets used:

Cartoon FX Free by Jean Moreno
Meshtint Free Chicken Mega Toon Series
Sounds from Freesounds.org
